body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#26326](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26326) (net: don't lock cs_main while reading blocks in net processing by andrewtoth)
* [#26316](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26316) (use shared mutex to guard against block files being removed before read by andrewtoth)
* [#26308](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26308) (rpc/rest/zmq: reduce LOCK(cs_main) scope: ~6 times as many requests per second by andrewtoth)
* [#26288](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26288) (Enable -Wstring-concatenation and -Wstring-conversion on clang builds by Empact)
* [#25232](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25232) (rpc: Faster getblock API by AaronDewes)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
